localization.title: WuWaScreenCard
localization.info: This is an overlay application for Wuthering Waves.
localization.desc_info_one:
1. OPEN GAME

2. Go to the character you want to create a card about
localization.desc_info_two:
3. OPEN THE APPLICATION

4. INPUT UID

5. CLICK Select Folder - CLICK «LAUNCH»

6. RETURN TO THE GAME

   AND WAIT UNTIL THE PROGRAM FINISHES
localization.done_generation: Image generation is complete! The card is saved in the folder: {path}
localization.please_select_folder: Please select a folder to save screenshots.
